history.content:
In my personal opinion, definitely take CS 70 in the summer. [I took CS 70 in Summer 2016]

Although many argue that it moves too fast, there really is a lot more time during the summer to digest the material with students taking usually only 1 class, and more time to go to OH and HW parties (definitely go to HW parties) for conceptual help. In addition, there will be about ~8 (7-8 questions) HW sets in the summer vs. ~14 (4-6 questions) HW sets during the semester. I also find weekly problem sets more annoying to manage during the semester when there are a lot more classes and activities going on.

I also personally like CS 61B's structure during the semester (not lab based) and the professors who teach the course during the semester are fantastic. Furthermore, people argue that 61B with Hilfinger (Fall) has a better grade distribution since your grade is more weighted on projects than exams.

I could not find a clear answer to this question. I am trying to take either 61BL or 70 during this summer, but I am really conflicted. Does anyone have any advice? Any help will be appreciated. Thanks!
history.subject: Summer 18   CS 61BL vs. 70
